message: I propose a fair split: 9000 for me and 1000 for you. I'm sure we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
Alice, your offer was quite unfair. Let's be reasonable - I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  Think carefully, the pot shrinks next round.
I'm willing to compromise. I propose a 55/45 split, with me getting the larger share.  We both get more than in the last offer. Let's work together and end this game.
